description: Unibaio is a technology-driven company focused on developing natural microparticles to enhance the efficiency of phytosanitary products like herbicides and pesticides. By utilizing chitosan, a biodegradable polymer derived from shrimp shells, Unibaio aims to reduce application doses and minimize environmental impact. The initiative emerged from a public funding opportunity for regional research, leveraging over 20 years of scientific expertise to create innovative solutions for sustainable agriculture.
name: Unibaio
